game.name: Farming Simulator 25
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Farming Simulator 25에서 혼자서 또는 멀티플레이어에서 협동하며 즐기는 보람찬 농장 생활에 여러분을 초대합니다. 이 농장은 여러분의 것입니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Farming Simulator 25 invites you to join the rewarding farm life, single-handedly or cooperatively in multiplayer. This Farm is Your Farm!

reviewHighlights.text: In my opinion, FS25 is pretty much the complete package now. Lots of crops and animals, built-in GPS, production chains, seasons... Really can't see h...
